name.description: The unique name of a service

namespace.description: The service namespace if the service is zookeeper or aerospike type

provider.description: The provider of service if the service is zookeeper/aerospike/elasticsearch/kafka/JDBC type

keyspace.description: The service keyspace if the service is cassandra type

index.description: The service index if the service is elasticsearch type

login.description: The service login if the service is elasticsearch type

password.description: The service password if the service is elasticsearch type

zkNamespace.description: A zookeeper namespace if the service is kafka type

zkProvider.description: A zookeeper provider if the service is kafka type

metadataNamespace.description: A cassandra namespace if the service is tstream type

metadataProvider.description: A cassandra provider if the service is tstream type

dataNamespace.description: A cassandra or aerospike namespace if the service is tstream type

dataProvider.description: A cassandra or aerospike provider if the service is tstream type

lockNamespace.description: A zookeeper namespace if the service is tstream type

lockProvider.description: A zookeeper provider if the service is tstream type

driver.description: A JDBC driver if the service is JDBC type

database.description: A database name if the service is JDBC type

basePath.description: A base path if the service is REST type

httpVersion.description: A version of HTTP if the service is REST type

headers.description: A HTTP headers if the service is REST type
